mapper.insert: INSERT INTO filebox(cno, tag, title, content, reg_date, day_of_week) VALUES(#{cno}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), DAYOFWEEK(now()))
mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, cno, content, b.reg_date regdate, tag, title, f.fno, f.fname, f.reg_date, SUBSTRING(f.fname, LOCATE('_', f.fname)+1) orginname FROM filebox b LEFT JOIN file f ON b.bno = f.file_box_bno WHERE bno = ${bno}

SELECT b.bno, cno, content, b.reg_date regdate, tag, title, f.fno, f.fname, f.reg_date, SUBSTRING(f.fname, LOCATE('_', f.fname)+1) orginname, a.username username FROM filebox b LEFT JOIN file f ON b.bno = f.file_box_bno LEFT JOIN accesslog a ON f.fno = a.file_fno WHERE bno = ${bno}
